Pre-Game Insights: The Orlando Magic will be without their top four scorers — Paolo Banchero, Franz Wagner, Jalen Suggs and Moe Wagner — and a reserve three-and-D guard (Gary Harris).
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Utah Jazz are one of five NBA teams yet to surpass 10 wins.
The Jazz have a below-average offense, but they can be effective.
The Magic have the third-best home record in the NBA.
The Magic have stayed afloat in the East's top four despite their injuries.
Others: The Orlando Magic will face the Utah Jazz on Sunday evening at the Kia Center.
The Jazz won a 36-point drubbing against the Miami Heat on Saturday evening.
